channel.title: [317]Where can i add Objects?
channel.description:
Hello, I was actually thinking to add a Thieving Stall but.. i can't find where to add it!
So i Searched the Source "Object" There was no "ObjectManager"
There was a File called "Object" But i was really something else...
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/a102g8.jpg[/img]
So i'm asking how to add Objects if there is not "ObjectManager", I tried even "Show Hidden Files"
Thank You

item.title: [317]Where can i add Objects?
item.dc:creator: @DartanRS DartanRS
item.description:
@DartanRS wrote:

Well, I see something like this…

makeGlobalObject(3086, 3493, 1, 1, 10);
makeGlobalObject(2870, 9954, 1, 1, 10);

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Where can i add Objects?
item.dc:creator: @Yesteryear Yesteryear
item.description:
@Yesteryear wrote:

The objectspawn file obviously. I don’t know the actual documentation of that file, but I suppose it’s something like

-object id-\t-object x-\t-object y-\t-object type-\t

\t is a tab.

Read full topic
